Info.Description:
Body Armour Durability Enhancement Modifies the properties of the body armour
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Body Armour is not depleted by wild animal attacks. [*] As a trade-off, body armour does not protect the player from wild animal attacks. [*] The same properties apply to the knife attacks of the Royal Army Beheader. [/list]
Version: 1.0 - FINAL modded by LinkHero95. credit to JRavens for his help.
